com.bigdata.rdf.sail.webapp.lbs

Class HostTable

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bigdata.rdf.sail.webapp.lbs.HostTable

  • public class HostTable
extends Object
    Class bundles together the set of HostScores for services that are joined with the met quorum and the HostScore for this service (iff it is joined with the met quorum).
    Author:
    Bryan Thompson

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      HostScore[] hostScores
      The table of pre-scored hosts -or- null iff there are no host scores.
      HostScore thisHost
      The most recent score for this host -or- null iff there is not score for this host.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      HostTable(HostScore thisHost, HostScore[] hostScores) 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • thisHost

        public final HostScore thisHost
        The most recent score for this host -or- null iff there is not score for this host.

      • hostScores

        public final HostScore[] hostScores
        The table of pre-scored hosts -or- null iff there are no host scores. Only hosts that have services that are joined with the met quorum will appear in this table.
